meanings.definition: Relating to a period of ten years.
meanings.sent1: The decadal report showed the changes over the past ten years.
meanings.sent2: The scientists studied the decadal patterns of rainfall in the region.
meanings.sent3: The decadal celebration marked a decade of friendship and memories.
meanings.sent4: Her growth over the years was like a decadal journey through seasons of life.
meanings.sent5: The decadal anniversary party was a colorful reminder of time passing by.

meanings.sent1: The decadal comet only visits our solar system once every ten years.
meanings.sent2: The decadal census provides crucial data for long-term planning.
meanings.sent3: The decadal reunion brought together friends from far and wide.
meanings.sent4: The decadal bloom of rare flowers was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent5: The decadal event was eagerly anticipated by the entire community.
